rewrite1: Begin by adjusting the first paragraph. Set the spacing after the paragraph to 1 centimeter, and align the text to be justified.
rewrite2: For the initial paragraph, adjust the spacing to 1 cm after the paragraph ends and align the text to be justified.
rewrite3: Begin by modifying the first paragraph: enhance the space that follows it to 1 centimeter, and adjust the alignment of the text to be justified.
